interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Colourpop ColourPop Eyeshadow Palette (FINE FEATHERED), 0.3 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Review Date: 2022/04/12
Store: Colourpop
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 4.65 x 1.06 inches; 0.3 Ounces'}
Review Text: You cannot beat the price or quality of Colourpop shadows!! This is a beautiful, deep pinks/ purple palette! You cannot find more affordable, consistently good palettes, like Colourpop has. I think you can still get the Super Shock set, that really add a shine to any look! ♡
Review Title: Fine Feathered..
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Too Faced x Kat Von D ~ Better Together Ultimate Eye Collection ~ Limited Edition
Too Faced
{'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.02 x 9.53 x 7.01 inches; 1.15 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01MQZUUTB_US', 'UPC': '651986906291'}
I love this set!! A full sized liner, and a Too Faced Better than Sex full sized. The colors are gorgeous. Kats "devotion" is a highly pigmented black!! Great for lining as well...I have the whole collection, and I almost let this by , but the deal was great!!! Recommended!
Great Sex!! Great Value!!
Magic Rainbow Strobing Brush Rainbow Brush
Too Faced
{'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Color': 'rainbow brush', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Weight': '0.13 Pounds'}
This brush is SO soft, and super pretty! The handle is an Irridecent purple with Too Faced written in Holographic print..Super good deal too! Get then before theyre gone!!
Super Nice!
Lime Crime 10th Birthday Unicorn Lipstick (Surprise). Long Lasting Cartoon Blue Creamy Matte Lippie (0.12oz / 3.5 g)
Lime Crime

Authentic, and super cute! I havent worn it yet, but I have others from this collection! Definitely recommend, if you're looking for a blue lip! Love Lime Crime!!
Authentic, and Adorable!
Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box
Colourpop
['Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box']
{'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Brand': 'Colourpop', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '4.92 x 4.45 x 0.63 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
These are HUGE! Had to get this to go with my palette! It's a peachy / gold, and arrived in pretty good shape... the pan, as  as the mirror is HUGE! It's really light weight too,  which is why I took off a star.. it was also slightly cracked on the edge,too, but I am going to use it, so that's fine... Great Formula! Amazing Brand!
Adorable!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Preferences:**
- Continuously favors high-quality makeup products, particularly eye cosmetics, while exploring vibrant lip products.
- Appreciates collections that offer value, favoring full-sized items and showing openness to new products like highlighters that enhance existing palettes.
- Displays a strong preference for vibrant, pigmented colors across all makeup categories, including bold shades for lips and eyes, with a growing interest in unique, themed collections.
- Values respected cosmetic brands for their quality and consistency, with a keen eye for unique packaging and design.

**Patterns:**
- Remains enthusiastic about limited edition or special collaboration collections, valuing unique items that align with their interests.
- Rates products positively, often around 4 to 5 stars, indicating satisfaction despite minor issues; the user has a history of finding great quality at affordable prices.
- Actively engages in promotions and values deals, reflecting a budget-conscious approach to cosmetics.
- Likely an informed consumer attentive to beauty trends and recommendations, expressing excitement about innovative features and visuals.

Overall, this user is a dedicated makeup enthusiast focused on quality, value, and vibrant pigmentation in eye and lip cosmetics, increasingly drawn to unique, themed collections that reflect their interests, and embracing diverse formulations to enhance their collection. Recent interactions indicate a strong appreciation for affordable quality in eye palettes.
